es.dabliw.aar.di. bandaranayaka agamathithuma 1956 di lankawe agamathiwaraya bawata pathwunu es.dabliw.aar.di. bandaranayaka agamathithuma desa, basa, rasa wenuwen karapu katayuthu nisa ethuma anagathaye pahala wenawayayi kiyawunu diyasena kumaraya kiyala boho dena handunwala thiyenawa. 2500 wani sambuddha jayanthiyath ee kalaye pawathwima nisa me adahasa bahutharayak pili aragena thibunath ee gana prasiddha prakashayak karapu bandaranayaka agamathithuma ee diyasena wenne thaman nowa lankawe podu janathawa kiyala prakasha kala.
